system.passengers:
Vehicle Traits: Open-Topped, Tracked Vehicle
Summary: Crew are exposed and can be targed by a Called Shot Action.  +10 to Difficult Terrain Tests, halve Critical roll that determines if Tactical Speed is halved (rounded down). Critical Damage to motive systems takes twice as long.
Special Rules: Can come in Enclosed Variant. Can spend a Full Action to remove or add Indirect Quality to Earthshaker Cannon, when removed it can act as a standard vehicle weapon requiring line of sight.
